title: Blood on the Sun (restored, colorized) (1945, thriller, imdb score: 6.1)

sources.title: Blood On The Sun 1945 Colorized Movie 576p
sources.description: Blood on the Sun is a 1945 American spy thriller film directed by Frank Lloyd and starring James Cagney , Sylvia Sidney and Porter Hall . The film is based on a fictional history behind the Tanaka Memorial document. The film won the Academy Award for Best Art Direction for a Black & White ( Wiard Ihnen , A. Roland Fields ) film in 1945.
